Header: President unveils portrait of Attorney H. Sri Nissanka at SLFP Head Office
Content: A portrait of State Attorney H. Sri Nissanka who rendered a pioneering service in the setting up of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party been unveiled at the Sri Lanka Freedom Party Head Office. It took place under the patronage of President Maithripala Sirisena. The commemoration of State Attorney H. Sri Nissanka, a great leader dedicated on behalf of national aspirations was held on the 26 of February. The portrait was unveiled at the Sri Lanka Freedom Party Head Office to mark this event. The President also offered flowers to this portrait. Many senior members of the Party including General Secretary of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party Parliamentarian Dayasiri Jayasekera, Senior Vice Chairman Nimal Siripala de Silva, Former Minister Mahinda Amaraweera and family members of Mr. Nissanka joined in the occasion. Meanwhile, the President also joined in the Galle District Balamandala meeting held at the Party Head Office under the restructure programme of the Sri Lanka Freedom Party.
